# Pull Request

## Description
Please describe the purpose of this pull request. Include the snippet number (if applicable), what changes you made, and why.

## Related Issue
Link to the related issue (e.g., `#123`) or state "None" if this is a new contribution.

## Changes Made
- [ ] Added new snippet (`python-1000-snippets/XXXX-Title-Name/`)
- [ ] Updated existing snippet (specify which)
- [ ] Improved documentation (e.g., `README.md`, `snippets_list.md`)
- [ ] Added cheatsheet or sample
- [ ] Fixed a bug (describe the fix)
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows PEP 8 style guidelines.
- [ ] Snippet has been tested in a clean Python 3.8+ environment.
- [ ] `README.md` in the snippet folder is updated with description, code, output, and explanation.
- [ ] `snippets_list.md` is updated (if adding a new snippet).
- [ ] Changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities.
- [ ] I have read and followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/VoxDroid/python-1000-snippets/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

## Additional Notes
Add any other relevant information, such as dependencies required or testing instructions.
